name: Singapore F1 Grand Prix
description: Experience the thrill of Formula 1 racing under the lights at Marina Bay Circuit. Premium weekend package with race tickets, luxury accommodation, and exclusive access.

matchTickets.name: F1 Race Tickets
matchTickets.description: Premium grandstand tickets for all 3 days including practice, qualifying, and race day

flights.name: Return Flights

hotel.name: Luxury Hotel Stay
hotel.description: 2 nights at 5-star hotel near Marina Bay with breakfast included

name: Liverpool vs Manchester United
description: Witness the biggest rivalry in English football at Anfield Stadium. Experience the electric atmosphere of this historic Premier League clash.

name: French Open Tennis Championship
description: Experience the clay court magic at Roland Garros. Watch the world's best tennis players compete in the prestigious French Open tournament.
